data.name: Slot Shots Pinball Collection Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Slot Shots Pinball Collection Demo includes access to two of the current four tables, and those two tables are Neon Nights 2 Skylines and Bass Hunter. These two tables will feature the score attack mode (also found in the full game version) in which you will have one minute to score as many points as possible during a three ball "multiball" activation. Once the one minute timer expires the table will tilt and drain any remaining balls. Pausing is disabled for this specific mode. The score attack mode also features a separate soundtrack which differs from the soundtrack found in the standard "normal" mode, and certain features (like an extra ball) are turned off for the score attack mode.

The normal mode for the tables also feature four camera angles, where as the score attack mode features a locked camera in an overhead view.
data.about_the_game:
The Slot Shots Pinball Collection Demo includes access to two of the current four tables, and those two tables are Neon Nights 2 Skylines and Bass Hunter. These two tables will feature the score attack mode (also found in the full game version) in which you will have one minute to score as many points as possible during a three ball "multiball" activation. Once the one minute timer expires the table will tilt and drain any remaining balls. Pausing is disabled for this specific mode. The score attack mode also features a separate soundtrack which differs from the soundtrack found in the standard "normal" mode, and certain features (like an extra ball) are turned off for the score attack mode.

The normal mode for the tables also feature four camera angles, where as the score attack mode features a locked camera in an overhead view.
data.short_description: The Slot Shots Pinball Collection demo version includes access to two tables, Neon Nights 2 Skylines and Bass Hunter, and will feature a one minute score attack mode for both tables.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
